content: Hi! I would like to have a conversation around https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/90006. It introduces a bit of work to every binary operation (+-/<<>><>==!=), which can be translated to a big regression in the kekkak perf test. Because of the way inference has to work there, it is hard to avoid that cost in the happy path (but I think there are things that could be done to do so, it's just time intensive, something I'm lacking lately).
